info.name: EMDR Complete Chat System
info.description: Complete collection for Customer ↔ Provider and Provider ↔ Admin chat system with text and image support.

request.description:
Create a new category. Requires PROVIDER role.

**Auth Required:** Yes (PROVIDER)

**Validation:**
- categoryName: Required, unique

**Response (201):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "uuid",
    "categoryName": "Photography",
    "createdAt": "2025-12-26T00:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2025-12-26T00:00:00.000Z"
  }
}
```

Get all categories with service counts.

**Auth Required:** No (Public)

**Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "uuid",
      "categoryName": "Photography",
      "servicesCount": 12,
      "createdAt": "2025-12-26T00:00:00.000Z",
      "updatedAt": "2025-12-26T00:00:00.000Z"
    }
  ]
}
```

Get a single category by ID with service count.

**Auth Required:** No (Public)

**Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "uuid",
    "categoryName": "Photography",
    "servicesCount": 12,
    "createdAt": "2025-12-26T00:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2025-12-26T00:00:00.000Z"
  }
}
```

Update an existing category. Requires PROVIDER role.

**Auth Required:** Yes (PROVIDER)

**Validation:**
- categoryName: Must be unique (cannot conflict with other categories)

**Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Category updated successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": "uuid",
    "categoryName": "Professional Photography",
    "servicesCount": 12,
    "updatedAt": "2025-12-26T00:00:00.000Z"
  }
}
```

Delete a category. Requires PROVIDER role.

**Auth Required:** Yes (PROVIDER)

**Relational Integrity:**
- Cannot delete if services exist under this category
- Returns 409 Conflict with error message

**Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Category deleted successfully"
}
```
Create multiple media items in a single request. Supports up to 50 items. All media items are independent and owned by the provider.

response.name: Create Media (Bulk)

body.raw:
{
  "media": [
    {
      "type": "IMAGE",
      "url": "https://example.com/image1.jpg",
      "thumbnailUrl": "https://example.com/thumb1.jpg",
      "width": 1920,
      "height": 1080,

      "fileSize": 10485760,
      "title": "Travel Vlog",
      "description": "My travel adventure",
      "category": "Travel",
      "location": "Tokyo, Japan"
    }
  ]
}
